ingredients: 15.25 oz. whole kernel sweet corn, drained
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the creamed corn, whole kernel corn, Jiffy mix, sour cream, and melted butter. Mix until well combined.
Pour the mixture into a greased 9 x 13 casserole dish or a 10-inch cast iron skillet.
Bake uncovered for 45 minutes, then remove from the oven and sprinkle the shredded cheddar cheese on top.
Return to the oven and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, until the cheese is melted and the top is golden brown.
Let the casserole stand for 5 minutes before serving.
tips:

- Ensure the whole kernel corn is well-drained to prevent excess moisture, which can make the casserole soggy. 
- Use room temperature ingredients for a smoother mix; this helps the casserole bake evenly. 
- Avoid overbaking; check for doneness when the top is golden brown and the center is firm.
